title: NEED HELP GM OR ADMIN LOL
body:
Hello sir, can i ask u something?
Why my ID cannt buy hero or anything else
Everytime i click the store and i get message error like this :
Session Expired
An error is preventing your store request from being processed at this time.
This issue can typically be resolved by closing and relogging into the League of Legends client.
We apologize for inconvenience, and thank you for your patience.
If this problem persists, please contact us at support.riotgames.com
Please help me GM or ADMIN LOL.

replies.body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/Uk0GxviK-got-an-issue-with-your-account-or-the-store-find-common-fixes-here

look in here under store i had the same issue and found the problem in here.

ITS got to do with the PVP.NET and your internet browser settings.
